forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Fix for Desktop i key

comments.text: Hi! In version 181.20 (you're on [version]), we fixed an issue when pressing "i" in desktop mode...
Before, it opened the inventory even while you were entering something into the virtual keyboard, that's properly prevented now!

thread.latestCommentText: Before, it opened the inventory even while you were entering something into the virtual keyboard, that's properly prevented now!
